attributes.action: HM Government to legalise cannabis Uk wide for Medicinal / Recreational use.
attributes.additional_details:
Please Check Out Our Facebook Group.

LEGALISE CANNABIS SCOTLAND UK.
attributes.background:
As i suffer from a herniated cervical disc that is severing my spinal chord and paralysed my right side my GP told me to try cannabis as a pain relief for my severe back pain and severe muscle spasms.
As i was using alcohol for pain relief my GP said i was doing more damage to other main organs.
